Anyone Have a Copy of Front Mission 2 (Japanese)?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2000 Topics (Year Of The Phoenix): Anyone Have a Copy of Front Mission 2 (Japanese)?
By Lisa Shock on Monday, October 30, 2000 - 08:54 pm:

I've been wondering about this for a while, but I met a guy at a local mall who said that Front Mission 2, which was only released in Japan, made a monster that has all 1's as the stats in MR2. Anyone have access to this game? (And not a burned copy, we have found they can give different monsters from the original game. Not to mention that they are illegal!)

By Eagle Fierce on Monday, October 30, 2000 - 09:25 pm:

If they do, I asked you if oyu could find a copy of that a while back, Lisa. The monster is great, but I'm (still, after months) hooked on FM3, and wouldn't mind getting a hold of a copy of FM2 or even FM1. Sure, the plot always has more holes in it than a pound of swiis cheese, but it's still fun and creative in its' form.

Sorry to blurt out, Lisa, but I'd like to get a copy of either for myself. You know how unreliable my stores are, around here. They couldn't even get a hold of a copy of MR2, let alone MR1! ^_^

By Lisa Shock on Monday, October 30, 2000 - 11:00 pm:

I think tronixweb.com still has it for sale. I just wasn't willing to buy it just for the possibility of the monster.
